Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over `parameterList`, use an enhanced for loop. This improves readability of the code and avoids potential index out of bounds errors.

Improvements.Improvement: Use try-with-resources for handling potential exceptions
Improvements.Description: If any method throws an exception that needs to be handled, it's better to use try-with-resources. This will ensure that resources are closed after the program is finished with them, reducing the risk of resource leaks.
